page.title: 19HANWORTH INDUSTRIAL ESTATES
page.content: In Hanworth there are 3 industrial estates with mainly light manufacturing (secondary industry):several engineering and electronics firms including a number of computer firms. There are marketing and distributive services as well. The Hanworth Trading Estate is the largest.The Hampton Farm Industrial Estate is the most modern. A firm Teddington Centreless Grinding invited us to look round. We found they finish metal articles sent from other companies.On the third estate one firm the Harven Form Foundry (metal manufacturing works) has been on the same site since 1942.Along Hampton Road West there are also DER Electronics in a tall office builing called Apex House and Konica a Japanese company. WHITTON SCHOOL
